item.title: Oil & Gas
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1564365029205{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Our staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.[/vc_column_text][cms_video_popup video_image="1580" button_style="white-button" video_source="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SF4aHwxHtZ0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1564365363924{margin-top: 64px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Stats & Charts" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text]We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][cms_heading text="Our Solutions" tag="h5" title_font_size="18px" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1554168994650{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Our primary Less-Than-Truckload service is completed using mezzanine floor tautliners and drop-deck open trailers, allowing us to maximise driver and vehicle utilisation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][cms_heading text="Production techniques" tag="h5" title_font_size="18px" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1554169012988{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight, we'll also see if service is a better solution for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image="2279" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1563783683279{margin-top: 29px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Why Us!" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1563783563885{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]We continue to pursue that same vision in today's complex, uncertain world, working every day to earn our customers’ trust! During that time, we’ve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1563787056930{margin-right: -10px !important;margin-left: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1564365029205{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Our staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.[/vc_column_text][cms_video_popup video_image="1580" button_style="white-button" video_source="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SF4aHwxHtZ0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1564365363924{margin-top: 64px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Stats & Charts" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text]We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][cms_heading text="Our Solutions" tag="h5" title_font_size="18px" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1554168994650{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Our primary Less-Than-Truckload service is completed using mezzanine floor tautliners and drop-deck open trailers, allowing us to maximise driver and vehicle utilisation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][cms_heading text="Production techniques" tag="h5" title_font_size="18px" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1554169012988{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight, we'll also see if service is a better solution for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image="2279" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1563783683279{margin-top: 29px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Why Us!" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1563783563885{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]We continue to pursue that same vision in today's complex, uncertain world, working every day to earn our customers’ trust! During that time, we’ve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1563787056930{margin-right: -10px !important;margin-left: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner item.title: How an efficient warehouse operation could save you a sale
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1555746283513{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]One of the biggest frustrations instore shoppers face is not being able to find products they're looking for - whether they are sold out, hard to find or simply not practical to keep in stock. And customers hardly ever ask about them if they're not. While these missed opportunities may seem inconsequential, they are starting to add up in this competitive retail environment where every sale counts.
The oldest, most proven method is to offer discounts to customers if they come back to the store when the item is replenished. This rewards customer loyalty while also offering an incentive. Unfortunately though, only 44% of retailers currently offer this service even as research shows 61% of shoppers globally want it.
The benefit of this method is that retailers can also build customer loyalty through personal shopping experiences. In stores where customers are looking for multiple items like groceries or tools, they can be given a personal shopping solution like Zebra’s PS20 that can guide them through the store giving additional product information while also alerting them with location-based vouchers.
Focus provides meet-and-greet facilities through our network of specialist companies. From hotel reservations and taxi arrangements to a full pick-up facility, with or without armed guards, this can be arranged.
Ever had a last minute requirement for items to be in a country where you do not have a visa to enter? Are you frustrated at having to hand-carry important documents to your client, which takes you out of the office for days? Let Focus help you. Our personnel are available 24-hours-a-day for these important deliveries. This leaves you free to concentrate on your business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: One of the biggest frustrations instore shoppers face is not being able to find products they're looking for whether they are sold out, hard to find or simply not practical to keep in stock. While these missed opportunities may seem inconsequential, they are starting to add up in this competitive retail environment where every sale counts.There is hope. Many retailers are now taking steps to directly address the frustration of a wasted trip by combining the convenience of online shopping with the delight of the in-store experience.

item.title: Role of the Importer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1563421788403{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Our staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.[/vc_column_text][cms_video_popup video_image="1580" button_style="white-button" video_source="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SF4aHwxHtZ0"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565594913010{margin-top: 63px !important;}"]We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1555901506062{margin-top: 36px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Challenge" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722667735{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]With manufacturing and distribution channels in literally every major market around the globe, and competing in an industry that is understandably zealous about supply chain management, was seeking a logistics partner capable of performing on a truly global scale. The service partner envisioned would not only be required to design and deliver on a model that would help contain costs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Solution" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722679198{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Such a commitment from a company of size and complexity, to globally integrate and standardize processes and manage logistics in every geographic theater, spoke volumes of the organization’s commitment to aggressively managing business costs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Results" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722690032{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1552723358730{margin-bottom: 17px !important;}"]People are the engine of success. Global Project Leader Export/Import stated, people at every level recognize the value of a partnership and the importance of working collaboratively. Working as one team, we’ve been able to focus on attacking costs, improving customer service, and managing continuous improvement across all aspects of our operations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image="2279" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1565756015921{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1553830395077{margin-top: 44px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Key Benifits" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][cms_space !important;}"]We continue to pursue that same vision in today's complex, uncertain world, working every day to earn our customers’ trust! During that time, we’ve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1563787056930{margin-right: -10px !important;margin-left: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1563788032750{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][cms_fancybox image_icon="1596" title="Transparent Pricing"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1563788039078{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][cms_fancybox image_icon="1591" title="Real-Time Tracking"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1563788046743{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][cms_fancybox image_icon="1595" title="Warehouse Storage"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1563788027472{margin-right: -10px !important;margin-left: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1563788055087{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][cms_fancybox image_icon="1594" title="Security For Cargo"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1563788060367{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][cms_fancybox image_icon="1593" title="Easy Payment Methods"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1563788065511{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][cms_fancybox image_icon="1592" title="24/7 Hours Support"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1563421788403{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Our staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.[/vc_column_text][cms_video_popup video_image="1580" button_style="white-button" video_source="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SF4aHwxHtZ0"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565594913010{margin-top: 63px !important;}"]We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1555901506062{margin-top: 36px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Challenge" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722667735{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]With manufacturing and distribution channels in literally every major market around the globe, and competing in an industry that is understandably zealous about supply chain management, was seeking a logistics partner capable of performing on a truly global scale. The service partner envisioned would not only be required to design and deliver on a model that would help contain costs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Solution" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722679198{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Such a commitment from a company of size and complexity, to globally integrate and standardize processes and manage logistics in every geographic theater, spoke volumes of the organization’s commitment to aggressively managing business costs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Results" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722690032{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1552723358730{margin-bottom: 17px !important;}"]People are the engine of success. Global Project Leader Export/Import stated, people at every level recognize the value of a partnership and the importance of working collaboratively. Working as one team, we’ve been able to focus on attacking costs, improving customer service, and managing continuous improvement across all aspects of our operations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image="2279" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1565756015921{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1553830395077{margin-top: 44px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Key Benifits" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][cms_space item.title: Warehouse On-Hand Inventory
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1563421788403{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Our staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.[/vc_column_text][cms_video_popup video_image="1580" button_style="white-button" video_source="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SF4aHwxHtZ0"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565594913010{margin-top: 63px !important;}"]We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1555901506062{margin-top: 36px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Challenge" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722667735{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]With manufacturing and distribution channels in literally every major market around the globe, and competing in an industry that is understandably zealous about supply chain management, was seeking a logistics partner capable of performing on a truly global scale. The service partner envisioned would not only be required to design and deliver on a model that would help contain costs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Solution" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722679198{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Such a commitment from a company of size and complexity, to globally integrate and standardize processes and manage logistics in every geographic theater, spoke volumes of the organization’s commitment to aggressively managing business costs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Results" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722690032{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1552723358730{margin-bottom: 17px !important;}"]People are the engine of success. Global Project Leader Export/Import stated, people at every level recognize the value of a partnership and the importance of working collaboratively. Working as one team, we’ve been able to focus on attacking costs, improving customer service, and managing continuous improvement across all aspects of our operations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image="2279" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1565756015921{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1553830395077{margin-top: 44px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Key Benifits" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][cms_space item.title: What is the Ocean Strategy?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1563421788403{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]Our staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct.[/vc_column_text][cms_video_popup video_image="1580" button_style="white-button" video_source="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SF4aHwxHtZ0"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565594913010{margin-top: 63px !important;}"]We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1555901506062{margin-top: 36px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Challenge" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722667735{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]With manufacturing and distribution channels in literally every major market around the globe, and competing in an industry that is understandably zealous about supply chain management, was seeking a logistics partner capable of performing on a truly global scale. The service partner envisioned would not only be required to design and deliver on a model that would help contain costs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Solution" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722679198{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Such a commitment from a company of size and complexity, to globally integrate and standardize processes and manage logistics in every geographic theater, spoke volumes of the organization’s commitment to aggressively managing business costs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][cms_heading text="The Results" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4" css=".vc_custom_1552722690032{padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1552723358730{margin-bottom: 17px !important;}"]People are the engine of success. Global Project Leader Export/Import stated, people at every level recognize the value of a partnership and the importance of working collaboratively. Working as one team, we’ve been able to focus on attacking costs, improving customer service, and managing continuous improvement across all aspects of our operations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image="2279" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1565756015921{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1553830395077{margin-top: 44px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Key Benifits" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][cms_space item.title: Importers achieve cost savings through the First Sale rule!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1555746003779{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]The trade war currently ensuing between the US and several nations around the globe, most fiercely with China, shows no signs of the first set of tariffs levied against solar. In today’s international and remote locations, experience and understanding of logistics operations and local networks is vital. With the many years of experience in our team, we have a detailed understanding of the criticality or every aspect of the logistics world.
Focus can provide logistics personnel to meet the needs of your company or project. From logistics managers to warehousemen, logistics controllers to transport coordinators, we can assist you. We provide personnel for one-off projects as well as long or short-term agency personnel, assist in the recruitment of permanent staff, or we can manage your logistics department for you.
When travelling to a foreign country, most people are nervous of the obstacles that will be there for them to overcome. When a full marine crew travels en-mass to a vessel mobilisation, it is imperative that they arrive on time and safely, especially in a remote location.
Focus provides meet-and-greet facilities through our network of specialist companies. From hotel reservations and taxi arrangements to a full pick-up facility, with or without armed guards, this can be arranged.
Ever had a last minute requirement for items to be in a country where you do not have a visa to enter? Are you frustrated at having to hand-carry important documents to your client, which takes you out of the office for days? Let Focus help you. Our personnel are available 24-hours-a-day for these important deliveries. This leaves you free to concentrate on your business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Cargo flow through better supply chain visibility, control.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1555746224903{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]Focus can provide logistics personnel to meet the needs of your company or project. From logistics managers to warehousemen, logistics controllers to transport coordinators, we can assist you. We provide personnel for one-off projects as well as long or short-term agency personnel, assist in the recruitment of permanent staff, or we can manage your logistics department for you.
The key to the success of any logistics contract is good logistics management. The key to good management is the ability to identify the needs of the client and the countries in which the work will take place, as well as being in a position to advise the best way forward. In today’s international and remote locations, experience and understanding of logistics operations and local networks is vital. With the many years of experience in our team, we have a detailed understanding of the criticality or every aspect of the logistics world.
When travelling to a foreign country, most people are nervous of the obstacles that will be there for them to overcome. When a full marine crew travels en-mass to a vessel mobilisation, it is imperative that they arrive on time and safely, especially in a remote location.
Focus provides meet-and-greet facilities through our network of specialist companies. From hotel reservations and taxi arrangements to a full pick-up facility, with or without armed guards, this can be arranged.
Ever had a last minute requirement for items to be in a country where you do not have a visa to enter? Are you frustrated at having to hand-carry important documents to your client, which takes you out of the office for days? Let Focus help you. Our personnel are available 24-hours-a-day for these important deliveries. This leaves you free to concentrate on your business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.excerpt:encoded: The Journal notes that last year, As investors such as Black Rock look deeper into strategy and climate change issues (and call them out specifically in their shareholder engagement activities), they are increasingly becoming more active in their support for calls for increased transparency. Three proposals at Exxon and PPL “were the first to garner majority votes on resolutions for annual disclosure of the impact on business from global efforts to limit the average rise in temperatures.

item.title: Air Freight
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565595790773{margin-bottom: 41px !important;}"]Our warehousing staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct. We'll also see if our sea-air service is a better solution for you.
We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, we’ve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world. Ongoing negotiations ensure that we always have the cargo space we need and the ability to offer you competitive rates - even during the high season.
Where possible, we’ll erect and dismantle Unit Load Devices (ULDs), reducing significantly the risk of damage to your shipment and saving you time and expense. We can do this because many of our freight stations have their own ground transportation at or around the airport.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1553853564949{margin-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Stats & Charts" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565595762565{margin-bottom: 41px !important;}"]Our mix of company-owned and contractor assets allows us to retain optimal levels of control whilst expanding our reach to over 96% of towns in Australia. With 40 years of LTL experience, we are now a trusted LTL freight provider for shippers of all sizes and commodity types.
Our LTL service extends to all states and territories, and includes multiple per-week services to places many others only serve occasionally, including Darwin, Alice Springs, Newman, Mt. Isa, Launceston and Burnie.
We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_round_chart type="doughnut" style="custom" stroke_width="0" values="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Retail%20%26%20Consumer%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2240%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22blue%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%2350d166%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Sciences%20%26%20Healthcare%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22pink%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%235553ce%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Power%20Generation%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2215%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22pink%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f8a137%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Industrial%20%26%20Chemical%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2215%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22sandy-brown%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f13a30%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Oil%20%26%20Gas%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22purple%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%231875f0%22%7D%5D" el_class="cms-round-chart" css=".vc_custom_1564124048742{margin-top: 8px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1553853603041{margin-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="How It Works?" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1553850077596{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, we’ve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world. Ongoing negotiations ensure that we always have the cargo space we need and offer you competitive rates.[/vc_column_text][cms_video_popup video_image="1580" button_style="white-button" video_source="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SF4aHwxHtZ0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1564127488199{margin-top: 35px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1563783683279{margin-top: 29px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Why Us!" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1563783563885{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]We continue to pursue that same vision in today's complex, uncertain world, working every day to earn our customers’ trust! We work closely with all major airlines around the world.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1563787056930{margin-right: -10px !important;margin-left: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_inner item.title: Supply Chain
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565595790773{margin-bottom: 41px !important;}"]Our warehousing staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct. We'll also see if our sea-air service is a better solution for you.
We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, we’ve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world. Ongoing negotiations ensure that we always have the cargo space we need and the ability to offer you competitive rates - even during the high season.
Where possible, we’ll erect and dismantle Unit Load Devices (ULDs), reducing significantly the risk of damage to your shipment and saving you time and expense. We can do this because many of our freight stations have their own ground transportation at or around the airport.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1553853564949{margin-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Stats & Charts" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565595762565{margin-bottom: 41px !important;}"]Our mix of company-owned and contractor assets allows us to retain optimal levels of control whilst expanding our reach to over 96% of towns in Australia. With 40 years of LTL experience, we are now a trusted LTL freight provider for shippers of all sizes and commodity types.
Our LTL service extends to all states and territories, and includes multiple per-week services to places many others only serve occasionally, including Darwin, Alice Springs, Newman, Mt. Isa, Launceston and Burnie.
We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_round_chart type="doughnut" style="custom" stroke_width="0" values="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Retail%20%26%20Consumer%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2240%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22blue%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%2350d166%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Sciences%20%26%20Healthcare%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22pink%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%235553ce%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Power%20Generation%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2215%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22pink%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f8a137%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Industrial%20%26%20Chemical%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2215%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22sandy-brown%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f13a30%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Oil%20%26%20Gas%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22purple%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%231875f0%22%7D%5D" el_class="cms-round-chart" css=".vc_custom_1564124048742{margin-top: 8px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1553853603041{margin-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="How It Works?" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1553850077596{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]We have more than twenty years of experience. item.excerpt:encoded: We provides a wide range of transportation services including quality international road transportation of cargoes & goods arriving from the ports all over the world.

item.title: Ocean Freight
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Overview" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565595790773{margin-bottom: 41px !important;}"]Our warehousing staff attaches great importance to customizing the booking process for our customers. That’s why we strive to find the air freight solution that best suits your needs. We’ll ask you when the freight is available, what the required delivery date is, and if there’s potential to save on time or cost. Your answers to these and other questions help us decide if you should book the air freight as direct. We'll also see if our sea-air service is a better solution for you.
We have more than twenty years of experience. During that time, we’ve become expert in freight transportation by air and all its related services. We work closely with all major airlines around the world. Ongoing negotiations ensure that we always have the cargo space we need and the ability to offer you competitive rates - even during the high season.
Where possible, we’ll erect and dismantle Unit Load Devices (ULDs), reducing significantly the risk of damage to your shipment and saving you time and expense. We can do this because many of our freight stations have their own ground transportation at or around the airport.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1553853564949{margin-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="Stats & Charts" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1565595762565{margin-bottom: 41px !important;}"]Our mix of company-owned and contractor assets allows us to retain optimal levels of control whilst expanding our reach to over 96% of towns in Australia. With 40 years of LTL experience, we are now a trusted LTL freight provider for shippers of all sizes and commodity types.
Our LTL service extends to all states and territories, and includes multiple per-week services to places many others only serve occasionally, including Darwin, Alice Springs, Newman, Mt. Isa, Launceston and Burnie.
We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services currently available in Australia. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and processing software, combined with decades of experience, ensure all freight is are shipped, trans-shipped and delivered as safely, securely, and promptly as possible.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_round_chart type="doughnut" style="custom" stroke_width="0" values="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Retail%20%26%20Consumer%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2240%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22blue%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%2350d166%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Sciences%20%26%20Healthcare%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22pink%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%235553ce%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Power%20Generation%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2215%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22pink%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f8a137%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Industrial%20%26%20Chemical%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2215%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22sandy-brown%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%23f13a30%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Oil%20%26%20Gas%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22purple%22%2C%22custom_color%22%3A%22%231875f0%22%7D%5D" el_class="cms-round-chart" css=".vc_custom_1564124048742{margin-top: 8px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1553853603041{margin-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1552704895602{margin-top: -5px !important;}"][cms_heading text="How It Works?" tag="h4" cms_template="cms_heading.php"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1553850077596{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}"]We have more than twenty years of experience. item.title: Request A Quote
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[response]

Need dependable, cost effective transportation of your commodities? Fill out our easy Quote Request Form below to get a fast quote on your job.

Personal Data

[text ct_company placeholder "Company"]
[text* ct_name placeholder "Name *"]
[email* ct_email placeholder "Mail *"]
[tel* ct_phone placeholder "Phone *"]

Pickup Address

[text ct_street placeholder "Street"]
[text ct_country placeholder "Country"]
[text ct_city placeholder "City"]
[text ct_zip placeholder "Zip"]
[radio pick_up_type default:1 "Lift Gate at Pickup Point" "Limited Access Pick Up"]

Drop-Off Address

[text ct_street2 placeholder "Street"]
[text ct_country2 placeholder "Country"]
[text ct_city2 placeholder "City"]
[text ct_zip2 placeholder "Zip"]
[radio pick_up_type2 default:1 "Call before Delivery" "Lift Gate at Pickup Point" "Limited Access Pick Up" "Hazmat"]

Item To Be Shipped

[select packaging-type "Packaging" "Packaging 1" "Packaging 2"]
[text ct_weight placeholder "Total Weight, lbs"]
[text ct_qty placeholder "QTY"]
[text ct_length placeholder "Length"]
[text ct_width placeholder "Width"]
[text ct_height placeholder "Height"]
[radio stackable default:1 "Stackable" "Non-Stackable"]
[submit class:btn class:radio-above class:btn__fullwidth"Request A Quote"] 1 Optime "[your-subject]" Optime admin@admin.com From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on logisti (http://7oroof.com/tfdemos/optime) logisti "[your-subject]" logisti [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on logisti (http://7oroof.com/tfdemos/optime) Reply-To: admin@admin.com Your form has been successfully submitted. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Your entered code is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid.
